childMarkdownRemark.html: Join us every third Thursday of the month for Show & Tell!

image.title: Monthly show and tell image
image.description: An illustration of an old computer terminal displaying "Monthly Show & Tell" with the OSHWA logo.

body.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We are so excited to be launching a monthly Show & Tell livestream happening on the third Thursday of every month! Our first stream will be Thursday, November 21st at 1pm EST and you can watch ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FVXza7CV6OY"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"live here","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" while we have creators who got certified in October come on and talk about their work.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"This month’s session will feature the ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://certification.oshwa.org/us002683.html"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Signet","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":", the ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://certification.oshwa.org/fr000023.html"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"pic0rick","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" and a ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://certification.oshwa.org/nz000005.html"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Respiratory Pressure and Flow Data Collection Device","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":". We’re really looking forward to hearing from these creators and knowing more about their journey to certification.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"All the streams will be recorded and put on our ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.youtube.com/@OpenSourceHardware"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"YouTube channel","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" as well so if you can’t make it to the livestream you’ll still be able to learn about these amazing projects!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
